page.title: 17ADULT ACTIVITIES IN BLAGDON
page.content: There are many activities for adults in Blagdon.The{Night Club}used to be held in the Village Club. The{Good {Companions}is a social organization for old people which is now held in the same place. At Blagdon School we organize carol singing parties most years for the village,and we also join the{Good {Companions}for their{carol service}in the church. {Aerobics}is held in the Methodist hall. Lots of mums go to get fit. We have a good village{cricket}team which plays on the cricket pitch next to the school.Matches are normally played in the evening or Saturdays. The{football and Rugby}is held on the Mead. It is played at the weekends. Our team's Rugby colour is green. Every year there is a{barn dance}on the Mead in a marquee.
